mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO INVENTORY_MATTERS_IOS ( ID, PERIODS, STORE_SET_ID, MATTERS_NO, START_DATE, END_DATE, THE_AMOUNT, SHO_AMOUNT, UNIT, DESC, DELETED, COMPANY_ID, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_BY ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{periods,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeSetId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{mattersNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{theAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{shoAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
SELECT SEQ_INVENTORY_MATTERS_IOS.nextval as id FROM dual
mapper.update:
UPDATE INVENTORY_MATTERS_IOS
PERIODS = #{periods,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STORE_SET_ID = #{storeSetId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
MATTERS_NO = #{mattersNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
START_DATE = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
END_DATE = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
THE_AMOUNT = #{theAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SHO_AMOUNT = #{shoAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESC = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
